tuv.seg: The European Union is a political and economic union of certain countries in Europe
Aontas polaitiúil agus eacnamaíochta tíortha faoi leith san Eoraip é Aontas na hEorpa
Find out how the European Union was founded, membership and aims of the EU
Faigh amach conas a bhunadh Aontas na hEorpa, ballraíocht agus aidhmeanna an AE
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Rialtas in Éirinn"
